item.title: Generic Mardown-Experiments Page
item.description: Generic Mardown-Experiments Page This page contains most of the static MarkDown base-elements we want to see expressed with all the Hugo themes, styles, configurations etc. under test. h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text

item.title: Mardown-Experiments Page
item.description: Mardown-Experiments Page This page contains most of the static MarkDown base-elements we want to see expressed with all the Hugo Themes, Styles, Configurations etc. under test. Thanks to markdown-it for most of the content of this file! Hide Frontmatter All frontmatter-code must be hidden Headings All Headings must be rendered and use CSS settings correctly h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +-
